Woeful England World Cup Exit

27 Jun 2010

I feel utterly ashamed to be English at the moment. Not because we have been comprehensively beaten by the Germans (again) or because of their dismal individual performances but simply because here we have a group of people who are meant to be the top of their profession representing their country, the highest honour that can be given to anyone, who simply had no passion, no will to win, no sense of pride, no drive, no determination and most of all no creativity.
